Title: Effective lower bounds for L.(1,Χ) via eisenstein series
Abstract: We give effective lower bounds for L (1, Χ) via Eisenstein series on G0(q) \ H. The proof uses the Maass-Selberg relation for truncated Eisenstein series and sieve theory in the form of the Brun-Titchmarsh inequality. The method follows closely the work of Sarnak in using Eisenstein series to find effective lower bounds for ζ (1 + it).
